sys_script_include.name: LoadData

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_331786_proj_tt.LoadData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LoadData</name><script><![CDATA[var LoadData = Class.create();
LoadData.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        var s = current.varuiables.subject1;
        var app = '';
        var sec;
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_courses');
        gr.addQuery('course_name', s);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            sec = gr.sys_id;
        }
        var grn = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_faculty');
        grn.addQuery('sub_opt', sec);
        grn.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            app = gr.sys_id.toString();
        }
        return 'sys_idIN' + app;
    },


    type: 'LoadData'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-04 11:26:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>fedad616dbd30010281270e239961957</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LoadData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project-Time Table Management System" source="x_331786_proj_tt">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Project-Time Table Management System">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fedad616dbd30010281270e239961957</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-04 11:27:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
